channel.title: languages on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in languages on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: A Week with Conan
item.description: If someone has been following my posts, they would sure know, I write C++ for most of the time, I spent to write any piece of code. The reaction to which most people resonate is, “ouch, you write c++, that must be really tough”.

item.title: Duck typing
item.description: Definition: Duck typing in computer programming is an application of the duck test—“If it walks like a duck and it quacks like a duck, then it must be a duck”—to determine if an object can be used for a particular purpose.

item.title: Languages are just tools, you idiot
item.description: Note: Don't take the title onto your ego For sake of clarity, I would like to make some terms used in the post clear, it may mean something other to you but for the simplicity of the post, I would be using them in a particular way:
